united.translation[0].definitions[0].def: joined or closely connected by feelings, aims etc
united.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The two countries were united against a common enemy.
united.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: a united effort to clean up the environment
united.translation[0].definitions[2].def: used in the names of some football teams and companies
united.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a word used in the names of many British football clubs
united.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: We're going to the football on Saturday -- United are playing Arsenal.
